2025-12-04.content: Config Connector version 1.140.0 is now available.

summary.title: Config Connector 1.140.0 Released
summary.summary: Config Connector version 1.140.0 has been released. This update brings new features and improvements to the tool.

2025-12-04.content:
New Alpha Resources (Direct Reconciler):

* `AssuredWorkloadsWorkload`
  + Manage Assured Workloads workloads to support compliance and security requirements.
* `ConfigDeliveryResourceBundle`
  + Manage Config Delivery resource bundles for Config Sync.

summary.title: New Alpha Resources Available
summary.summary: We have added new alpha resources to manage Assured Workloads and Config Delivery bundles. These resources provide enhanced control over compliance, security, and configuration management.

2025-12-04.content:
Reconciliation Improvements:

* Integrated Multi-Cluster Leader Election for improved reliability in multi-cluster setups.

summary.title: Updated Reconciliation Reliability
summary.summary: Reconciliation has been enhanced with integrated multi-cluster leader election, improving reliability for multi-cluster environments.

2025-12-04.content:
New Beta Resources (Direct Reconciler):

* `CertificateManagerCertificateIssuanceConfig`
  + Manage Certificate Manager certificate issuance configurations for automating certificate issuance.

summary.title: Automated Certificate Issuance Beta
summary.summary: Manage certificate issuance configurations for automating certificate issuance with the new beta resource. This feature allows for streamlined management of your certificates.

2025-12-04.content:
New Fields:

* `AlloyDBCluster`
  + Added `spec.restoreContinuousBackupSource` and `spec.restoreBackupSource` fields to support restoring from a backup.
* `BigQueryReservationAssignment`
  + Added `spec.jobType` field.
* `FirestoreDatabase`
  + Added `spec.deleteProtectionState` field.
* `FirestoreField`
  + Added `spec.ttlConfig` field.
* `RunJob`
  + Added `spec.template.template.containers.dependsOn` field.

summary.title: New fields added to several resources
summary.summary: Several resources have new fields to enhance functionality. These include options for restoring backups in AlloyDB, specifying job types in BigQuery reservations, managing delete protection for Firestore databases, configuring TTL for Firestore fields, and defining container dependencies in Run Jobs.

2025-12-04.content:
* Fixed an issue where `BigQueryReservationAssignment` was not exposing `externalRef`.
* Fixed an issue with `CertificateManagerDNSAuthorization` API, Fuzzer and Mapper.
* Fixed an issue with `FirestoreDatabase` defaulting logic.

summary.title: Resolved API and Service Issues
summary.summary: Resolved an issue where BigQueryReservationAssignment was not exposing externalRef. Additionally, fixed problems with the CertificateManagerDNSAuthorization API, Fuzzer, and Mapper, as well as the FirestoreDatabase defaulting logic.

2025-11-20.content: Config Connector version 1.139.0 is now available.

summary.title: New Config Connector Version Released
summary.summary: Config Connector version 1.139.0 has been released. This update introduces new features and improvements to help manage your cloud resources.

summary.title: IAM Policy Updates
summary.summary: Improvements have been made to IAM policy reconciliation, specifically enhancing partial policy management capabilities.

2025-11-20.content:
New Features:

* The controller type is now reported at the start and end of reconciliation.
* Mockgcp now supports `iap oauth brands` and `bigtable materializedview`.

summary.title: New Controller and Mock GCP Features
summary.summary: We've enhanced our reconciliation process by adding controller type reporting at the start and end. Additionally, Mockgcp now includes support for 'iap oauth brands' and 'bigtable materializedview'.

2025-11-20.content:
* Reduced the memory footprint of the recorder.
* `SQLInstance`: Fixed an issue where empty `maintenanceVersion` patches were sent. The `settings` and `maintenanceVersion` fields are now unmanaged.
* `FirestoreDatabase`: Fixed boolean value exports.

summary.title: Improvements and Fixes
summary.summary: We've optimized memory usage for the recorder and fixed several issues, including incorrect maintenance version patches for SQL instances and boolean export problems for Firestore databases. The settings and maintenance version fields for SQL instances are now unmanaged.

summary.title: New Alpha Resources Available
summary.summary: We have introduced new Alpha resources, including the direct reconciler and FirestoreField. These additions aim to enhance functionality and provide greater flexibility for your projects.

2025-10-16.content: Config Connector version 1.137.0 is now available.

summary.title: Config Connector v1.137.0 Available
summary.summary: Config Connector version 1.137.0 has been released.

2025-10-16.content:
New Fields:

* `BigtableMaterializedView`: Added `spec.sourceTableRef` and `spec.definition`.
* `BackupDRBackupPlan`: Added `spec.backupConfig.retentionPeriodDays` and `spec.backupConfig.backupWindow`.
* `MemorystoreInstance`: Added support for `MEMCACHE` and `REDIS` instance types.

summary.title: New fields and instance types supported
summary.summary: Added new fields to BigtableMaterializedView and BackupDRBackupPlan, and introduced support for MEMCACHE and REDIS instance types in MemorystoreInstance.

2025-10-16.content:
Reconciliation Improvements:

* Enabled opt-in for IAM partial policy management.
* Enabled server-side apply for KMS resources.
* Improved reconciliation for `BigtableLogicalView` by using deep reflection.
* Improved reconciliation for `FirestoreDatabase` with identity pattern and export support.
* Improved reconciliation for `RunJob` with export support.
* Unified `ComputeTargetTCPProxy` direct API and controller.

summary.title: Reconciliation Improvements
summary.summary: Opt-in for IAM partial policy management and server-side apply for KMS resources are now enabled. Reconciliation has been enhanced for Bigtable, Firestore, and RunJob resources, with unified direct API and controller for ComputeTargetTCPProxy.

2025-10-16.content:
Bug Fixes:

* Fixed an issue where `ComputeBackendService` backends were not sorted.
* Fixed an issue where `CloudFunctionsFunction` runtime was not a supported value.
* Fixed an issue with labels for `BackupDRBackupPlan`.
* Fixed an issue with labels for `RunJob`.
* Fixed a fuzzing issue for `FirestoreField`.
* Fixed an issue with `KMSCryptoKey` import.
* Fixed a flakiness issue in the `MonitoringDashboard` fuzzer.
* Fixed a flakiness issue in tests.
* Fixed an issue with bad labels in tests.
* Fixed an issue with `etag` in direct reconciliation.

summary.title: Fixed an issue with etag in direct reconciliation.
summary.summary: This release includes several bug fixes. Notably, we resolved an issue with sorting for ComputeBackendService backends and corrected unsupported runtime values for CloudFunctionsFunction. Additionally, label-related issues for BackupDRBackupPlan and RunJob have been addressed, along with a fuzzing issue for FirestoreField and an import problem for KMSCryptoKey.

summary.title: New Alpha Resources (Direct Reconciler)
summary.summary: New Alpha Resources (Direct Reconciler) including BigtableMaterializedView are now available.

summary.title: New Beta Resources
summary.summary: We are introducing new beta resources: DocumentAIProcessorVersion, EssentialContactsContact, BigQueryBigLakeTable, and BackupDRBackupPlan.

2025-10-07.content:
Bug Fixes:

* Added support for checking `etag` in spec for alpha resources.
* Fixed an issue where `CloudIdentityMembership` roles comparison would fail.
* Fixed a bug where the wrong GVK was reported in IAM controller.
* Fixed a bug where errors were swallowed when reading a Secret.
* Fixed an issue with LRO endTime in mockgcp.
* Fixed a bug in the `etag` mapper.
* Fixed a bug in the mapper generator for slice and single object map.
* Fixed a bug in the mapper generator for OneOf if the input is not proto.Message.
* Fixed an import for refs in the same package in `controllerbuilder`.

summary.title: Bug Fixes
summary.summary: Multiple bugs have been fixed, including issues with etag checking, role comparison, GVK reporting, secret handling, LRO endTime, and mapper generators. Support for checking etag in spec for alpha resources has also been added.

New Fields:

* [`ComposerEnvironment`](https://docs.cloud.google.com/config-connector/docs/reference/resource-docs/composer/composerenvironment)
  + Added `spec.storageConfig` field.
  + Added `spec.config.workloadsConfig.dagProcessor` field.

summary.title: New Fields for Composer Environment
summary.summary: The Composer Environment resource has been updated with new fields including spec.storageConfig, spec.config.workloadsConfig.dagProcessor, spec.config.workloadsConfig.triggerer, spec.config.softwareConfig.webServerPluginsMode, and spec.config.softwareConfig.cloudDataLineageIntegration.

2025-10-07.content:
Reconciliation Improvements:

* Introduced [Stateful Reconciliation for Direct Controllers](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/k8s-config-connector/blob/master/docs/designs/stateful-reconciliation-with-cookie.md). With stateful reconciliation, the direct controller stores a hash of the last successfully applied `.spec` in the resource's `.status`. This provides a lightweight, GitOps-safe record when a user has modified the desired state of the resource.

summary.title: Stateful Reconciliation Introduced
summary.summary: Stateful reconciliation is now available for direct controllers, storing a hash of the last applied spec for GitOps safety.
